name: DANSKE TEGL
membership: TBE (Tiles and Bricks Europe), Cerame Unie
goal:
DANSKE TEGL (Danish Brick and Roof Tile Association) is the association for the Danish ceramic manufacturing industry, representing the common and collective interests of all sectors of the industry. Our member companies include manufacturers from the following industry sub-sectors:

Bricks
Clay Roof Tiles
Mortar
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Climate change, energy efficiency, renewable energy, Emissions Trading System, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Construction Products Regulation, Standardisation, Waste legislation, Industrial Emissions Directive, NEPSI, Research & Innovation, Circular Economy.
